sc_api_tools.rest_managers.media_managers package

Submodules

sc_api_tools.rest_managers.media_managers.image_manager module

class sc_api_tools.rest_managers.media_managers.image_manager.ImageManager(session: sc_api_tools.http_session.sc_session.SCSession, workspace_id: str, project: sc_api_tools.data_models.project.Project)

Bases: sc_api_tools.rest_managers.media_managers.media_manager.BaseMediaManager[sc_api_tools.data_models.media.Image]

Class to manage image uploads and downloads for a certain project

get_all_images() → sc_api_tools.data_models.containers.media_list.MediaList[sc_api_tools.data_models.media.Image]

Get the ID’s and filenames of all images in the project

Returns

MediaList containing all Image entities in the project

upload_image(image: Union[numpy.ndarray, str, os.PathLike]) → sc_api_tools.data_models.media.Image

Upload an image file to the server

Parameters

filepath_to_image – full path to the image on disk

Returns

String containing the unique ID of the image, generated by Sonoma Creek

upload_folder(path_to_folder: str, n_images: int = - 1, skip_if_filename_exists: bool = False) → sc_api_tools.data_models.containers.media_list.MediaList[sc_api_tools.data_models.media.Image]

Uploads all images in a folder to the project. Returns a MediaList containing all images in the project after upload.

Parameters

  • path_to_folder – Folder with images to upload

  • n_images – Number of images to upload from folder

  • skip_if_filename_exists – Set to True to skip uploading of an image if an image with the same filename already exists in the project. Defaults to False

Returns

MediaList containing all image’s in the project

download_all(path_to_folder: str, append_image_uid: bool = False) → None

Download all images in a project to a folder on the local disk.

Parameters

  • path_to_folder – path to the folder in which the images should be saved

  • append_image_uid – True to append the UID of an image to the filename (separated from the original filename by an underscore, i.e. ‘{filename}_{image_id}’). If there are images in the project with duplicate filename, this must be set to True to ensure all images are downloaded. Otherwise images with the same name will be skipped.

upload_from_list(path_to_folder: str, image_names: List[str], extension_included: bool = False, n_images: int = - 1, skip_if_filename_exists: bool = False)

From a folder containing images path_to_folder, this method uploads only those images that have their filenames included in the image_names list.

Parameters

  • path_to_folder – Folder containing the images

  • image_names – List of names of the images that should be uploaded

  • extension_included – Set to True if the extension of the image is included in the name, for each image in the image_names list. Defaults to False

  • n_images – Number of images to upload from the list

  • skip_if_filename_exists – Set to True to skip uploading of an image if an image with the same filename already exists in the project. Defaults to False

Returns

Dictionary containing a mapping between the ID’s of the images and their filenames (excluding extensions). NOTE: Filenames are used as keys, ID’s as values

delete_images(images: Sequence[sc_api_tools.data_models.media.Image]) → bool

Deletes all Image entities in images from the project

Parameters

images – List of Image entities to delete

Returns

True if all images on the list were deleted successfully, False otherwise

class sc_api_tools.rest_managers.media_managers.media_manager.BaseMediaManager(session: sc_api_tools.http_session.sc_session.SCSession, workspace_id: str, project: sc_api_tools.data_models.project.Project)

sc_api_tools.rest_managers.media_managers.video_manager module

class sc_api_tools.rest_managers.media_managers.video_manager.VideoManager(session: sc_api_tools.http_session.sc_session.SCSession, workspace_id: str, project: sc_api_tools.data_models.project.Project)

Bases: sc_api_tools.rest_managers.media_managers.media_manager.BaseMediaManager[sc_api_tools.data_models.media.Video]

Class to manage video uploads and downloads for a certain project

get_all_videos()

Get the ID’s and filenames of all videos in the project

Returns

Dictionary containing the ID’s (as keys) and filenames (as values) of the videos in the project

upload_video(video: Union[numpy.ndarray, str, os.PathLike]) → sc_api_tools.data_models.media.Video

Upload a video file to the server. Accepts either a path to a video file, or a numpy array containing pixel data for video frames.

In case a numpy array is passed, this method expects the array to be 4 dimensional, it’s dimensions shaped as: [frames, heigth, width, channels]. The framerate of the created video will be set to 1 fps.

Parameters

video – full path to the video on disk, or numpy array holding the video pixel data

Returns

String containing the unique ID of the video, generated by Sonoma Creek

upload_folder(path_to_folder: str, n_videos: int = - 1, skip_if_filename_exists: bool = False) → sc_api_tools.data_models.containers.media_list.MediaList[sc_api_tools.data_models.media.Video]

Uploads all videos in a folder to the project. Returns the mapping of video filename to the unique ID assigned by Sonoma Creek.

Parameters

  • path_to_folder – Folder with videos to upload

  • n_videos – Number of videos to upload from folder

  • skip_if_filename_exists – Set to True to skip uploading of a video if a video with the same filename already exists in the project. Defaults to False

Returns

MediaList containing all video’s in the project

download_all(path_to_folder: str, append_video_uid: bool = False) → None

Download all videos in a project to a folder on the local disk.

Parameters

  • path_to_folder – path to the folder in which the videos should be saved

  • append_video_uid – True to append the UID of a video to the filename (separated from the original filename by an underscore, i.e. ‘{filename}_{video_id}’). If there are videos in the project with duplicate filename, this must be set to True to ensure all videos are downloaded. Otherwise videos with the same name will be skipped.

delete_videos(videos: Sequence[sc_api_tools.data_models.media.Video]) → bool

Deletes all Video entities in videos from the project

Parameters

videos – List of Video entities to delete

Returns

True if all videos on the list were deleted successfully, False otherwise

  • image_names – List of names of the images that should be uploaded
